title: House in Country with Horse Pasture
posting_body: Newly refinished Hardwood floors, ceiling fans, central air.
Ideal for horse owner, approximately 6 acres, fenced-in grass pasture, many large shade trees and two separate double-stall outbuildings.
Large kitchen, 1 1/2 baths, washer and dryer, large walk-out basement, attached garage.
City water, natural gas, and garbage pick-up.
Private country setting and only five minutes south of Belleville (off Hwy 159), located on a cul-de-sac, no through traffic.
